;Climb up the steep steps. At the top of the mountain, there is a flat area. On the flat side, I saw that long-known plant. It is not eye-catching, slightly similar to the common broom grass in Sichuan, but shorter; it is also a bit like orchid grass, but with thinner leaves. It has not yet reached the flowering period, and there is no purple-red color like the clouds in the picture. If you look closely, it does look like a toothbrush. No wonder it is called toothbrush grass among the people. In fact, its scientific name is Haizhou Xiangnuo, and its other name is more widely known: Copper Grass Flower.

;

;It is not difficult to imagine how excited the ancestors who were looking for it were when they saw the coppergrass flowers all over the mountains and plains on this gentle hillside three thousand years ago. They were even ecstatic with excitement. Because the copper grass flower is a symbol of an important metal - wherever it grows, deep in the earth, there must be copper mines...

;

;;

;

;Tonglushan ancient copper mine site is located in Three kilometers west of Daye City, Hubei Province. ;（IC Photo/图）;

;

;Gifts

;

;The banquet was over, and King Chu Cheng gave it to those who came to see him Zheng Wengong gave a generous gift.

;

;This generous gift is estimated to be worth about 20,000 to 30,000 yuan based on today's market price. However, in the distant Spring and Autumn Period, its value could not be measured in terms of money.

;

;This is copper. When Zheng Wengong returned to Zheng State with a thousand kilograms of copper, King Chu Cheng regretted it more and more. He sent an envoy to catch up with Zheng Wengong - he must have wanted to take back the copper, but doing so would not only offend Zheng State, but also make people in the world joke.

;

;King Chu Cheng’s regret had very clear practical considerations. In the pre-Qin period, the ancients classified the major affairs of the country into two things, namely "the major affairs of the country are sacrifice and military affairs" as stated in "Zuo Zhuan". Although the original meaning of "Zuo Zhuan" refers to sacrificial rituals and military rituals, later generations further extended it and believed that the most important things in the country were sacrifices and wars. Both sacrifices and wars are inseparable from copper - sacrifices require a large number of bronze vessels to be cast; as for wars, copper is a necessity for making weapons. Compared with the stone, bone and wooden weapons of the Stone Age, copper weapons are invincible and have unparalleled superiority.

;

;Bronze originated in the Longshan Culture period. The Xia Dynasty began to enter the Bronze Age, while the Shang Dynasty and Zhou Dynasty reached the peak of bronze civilization.

;

;The so-called bronze is an alloy of copper and tin or lead. It was called gold and lucky gold in ancient China. Among the chemical elements that make up bronze, the most important is copper, which accounts for more than 80%. Without copper, there would be no bronze; without bronze, there would be no bronze civilization.

;

;For King Chu Cheng, his regret was not about the thousand catties of copper. Copper, he had plenty of it. He was worried that Zheng Guo would take the copper back to make weapons. Therefore, he asked Zheng Wengong to promise that the copper donated by the Chu State could only be used for ritual vessels.

;

;Tracing back to the origins of Chu State, it was once so humble that it could be ignored. In terms of level, among male princes, Bozi belongs to the fourth level: Zi. Regarding the initial land enfeoffment, it was only fifty miles away. There is a story that illustrates the weakness of the Chu people when they founded the country: After Xiong Yi was named the son of Chu, he built a temple. After the temple was completed and the first sacrifice was about to be held, it was discovered that they were so poor that they didn't even have a sacrificial cow. This "country" is so big, but it can't even produce a single cow, which shows how small and shabby this "country" is. Out of poverty, Xiong Yi took people to the neighboring country of Bo to steal a calf. After the calf was stolen back, Xiong Yi was afraid that the owner would come to visit him, so he had to kill the calf overnight to sacrifice it - and the rules at that time were that sacrifices were held during the day. Since then, the Chu people have formed a unique custom: all sacrifices are held at night.

;

;Just like a trickle of water can gather into a mighty river, as long as enough time is given, a miracle may be born. For the Chu State, if it was like an unobtrusive flame in the wind when it was founded, then, after hundreds of years of continuous development, by the time of Xiong Tong, the son of Chu in the early Spring and Autumn Period, the Chu State had risen. Become an important presence among the princes.

;

;In 704 BC, which was the thirty-seventh year of Xiong Tong's reign, he sent his followers to ask the Emperor of Zhou to promote him to a noble title. However, Emperor Zhou flatly refused. Xiong Tong was furious and proclaimed himself king, calling him King Wu of Chu. Although the Emperor of Zhou has lost his former authority since King Ping of Zhou moved eastward, the princes who dared to brag against the disapproval of the world and claim the title of king began with Xiong Tong.

;

;Xiong Tong dared to fight against the Emperor Zhou. On the one hand, due to the hard work of more than ten generations, the Chu State was no longer the small country with a lot of obstacles; on the other hand, after many years of hard work, the Chu people gradually controlled One of the most important strategic materials has the material basis to challenge Emperor Zhou.

;

;That is copper, copper from the Coppergreen Mountain.

;

;;

;

;Azurite mine in Tonglu Mountain;（IC Photo/图）;

;

;From the northeast To the southwest, after crossing the Yangtze River via the Qijia Expressway, it enters Huangshi City, Hubei Province. To the north of the highway, there is a lake of tens of square kilometers, which is Daye Lake connected to the Yangtze River. The westernmost end of Daye Lake is Daye under the jurisdiction of Huangshi. Heading west out of Daye, the road twists and turns, passing through undulating low mountainous areas.

;

;Tonglu Mountain is hidden deep in this low mountainous area. The "Daye County Chronicle" published by Tongzhi in the Qing Dynasty explained the origin of the name Tonglu Mountain: "The top of the mountain is high and flat, with huge rocks facing each other. Every time it rains, there are bronze greens like snowflakes and adzuki beans dotted on the earth and rocks. Hence the name. It stretches for several years. Zhang, the soil color is purple and red, and they are all Guanshan. It may be the place where copper was produced in ancient times." This green snowflake adzuki bean is actually malachite, which is a copper-containing carbonate mineral that is often associated with copper. The large amount of malachite washed out of the surface after a shower shows that the copper mine in Tonglushan is shallowly buried and of high grade, making it a rare rich mine.

;

;As far as China is concerned, copper resources are widely distributed and relatively concentrated. In general, the main copper mines are in the south. There is a rich copper ore belt in the middle and lower reaches of the Yangtze River - from Tonglu Mountain to Ruichang, more than 100 kilometers away, and to Tongling, more than 300 kilometers away, there are dots of large copper mines, with reserves accounting for one-third of the country. Two or more.

;

;The rise of Chu State was also invincible due to the blessing of Tonglu Mountain. As the first metal mastered by human beings, a steady stream of high-grade copper ore is put into burning furnaces to smelt out massive amounts of copper, which is then combined with tin or lead to be upgraded to bronze - ritual vessels cast in bronze, lingering in the smoke. The temples made of bronze became a bridge between the Chu people and their ancestors and gods; the agricultural tools made of bronze allowed the vast land in the south to be reclaimed, and more food was enough to feed a larger population; the weapons made of bronze accompanied the Chu people who were brave and good at fighting. Charge into battle, expand territory...

;

;Conquest

;

;Starting from Tonglu Mountain, a three-hour drive, nearly 300 kilometers away to the northwest is Suizhou City, Hubei Province. In Suizhou, the sensational tomb of Zeng Houyi was discovered. The most important cultural relic unearthed from the tomb of Zeng Houyi is now stored in the Hubei Provincial Museum, which is the bronze chime that can still play beautiful music.

;

;Zeng Hou is the king of Zeng State; and Zeng State is another name for Sui State, which was enfeoffed by Zhou Dynasty. Thousands of cultural relics were unearthed from the tomb of Marquis Yi of Zeng, among which the total weight of bronze products exceeds ten tons - the bronze chime alone weighs four tons. So much copper, where does it come from? In the past few years, professionals used chemical and spectral analysis on Zeng Houyi's chime bell, and compared it with the copper mine data unearthed from the Tonglushan archeology, and concluded that the copper material of Zenghou Yi's chime bell came from Tonglushan. ——Using the same method, it was also proved that the raw materials of the bronzes unearthed from Fuhao's tomb in Yinxu, Anyang, also came from Tonglu Mountain.

;

;;

;

;Zeng Houyi Bronze Chime Bell;(Visual China/Picture);

;

;These conclusions are actually Within reason. Not only did the large amount of copper material in the tomb of Zeng Hou Yi come from the Tonglu Mountain, but even when the Emperor of Zhou was enfeoffed to follow the country, a very important reason was for copper. During the Shang and Zhou dynasties, there was a busy and important copper-tin road in the hinterland of China. That is what the bronze inscriptions call "the path of gold and tin".

;

;In the National Museum of China, there is a bronze vessel named Zeng Boyun. The 簠 is a utensil used to serve rice during sacrifices or banquets. It is also called the 簋, the square one is called 簠 and the round one is called 簋. Zeng Boyun was used by the king of Zeng (;Sui;). The inscription on it contains the following sentences: "...Kedi Huaiyi, suppress the Xiefan Tang, move the golden road and tin, and use all the tools to prepare the way." It means: (;Zeng Bo;) punish the Huaiyi , the transportation hub Fantang and the copper and tin channels have been stabilized and have returned to normal. This is the origin of Jindaoxixing.

;

;The Shang Dynasty moved its capital many times, but generally speaking, they were all in today's Central Plains region; the Western Zhou Dynasty made its capital Haojing, now Xi'an; the Eastern Zhou Dynasty moved its capital to Luoyi, now Luoyang. During the heyday of the Bronze Age, the demand for copper and supporting tin for thousands of years during the Shang and Zhou dynasties was undoubtedly astronomical. In the vast north or the Yellow River Basin, only Zhongtiao Mountain and other places had copper mines, but the output was small. . The copper and tin needed by the Shang and Zhou Dynasties could only be transported thousands of miles from the south.

;

;The general route of the Jindao Tin Line, which mainly transports copper and tin, is as follows: Hunan's tin and Tonglu Mountains and northern Jiangxi's copper, after being collected in the present-day Wuhan area, arrive in Suizhou via Xiaogan, along the Suizao Corridor. It entered the Nanyang Basin, then passed through present-day Fangcheng and Ye County to Luoyang, or continued westward to Guanzhong.

;

;This is an extremely difficult transportation line. Two or three thousand years ago, when roads and railways were scarce and there were only rugged trails, the ancients could only rely on animals and manpower in addition to ships.

;

;Long transportation lines mean more risks and more uncertainties. Especially when the transported items are copper that determines the fate of the country, the risks increase sharply.

;

;In order to ensure the smooth transportation of copper and tin from Tonglu Mountain and other places to the capital, Emperor Zhou enfeoffed more than a dozen small countries in important areas north of the Han River and south of the upper reaches of the Huai River. Most of these small countries have the surname Ji, or are related to the surname Ji, so they are called the Ji of Hanyang. The concubines of Hanyang had two tasks. One was to guard against Huaiyi in the south; the other was to ensure the smooth flow of the copper and tin road. After the decline of Huaiyi and the rise of Chu, the first task of Zhu Ji changed from guarding against Huaiyi to guarding against Chu. However, things are unpredictable. Not only did the concubines of Hanyang fail to curb Chu's northward and eastward advance, but even the copper-tin road they guaranteed and even the Tonglu Mountain that produced copper mines fell into the hands of the Chu people. In the end, "Hanyang" All concubines, the state of Chu is complete."

;

;The countries established by the concubines of Hanyang are dotted in the intersection of north and south China, including Tang, Cai, Ying, Xi, Shen, Sui, etc. Among the concubines, Sui Guo is the most powerful and is the leader of them all.

;

;Nanyang Basin and Jianghan Plain are separated by a series of low and gentle mountains. Among them, there is a long and narrow plain between Dahong Mountain and Tongbai Mountain, both running northwest to southeast, which becomes the link between Nanyang Basin and Jianghan Plain. traffic channels between. This tunnel is bounded by Suizhou in the south and Zaoyang in the north, so it is called the Suizao Corridor. As the eldest among the concubines in Hanyang, Sui Guo follows the gateway of the Zao Corridor and connects to the Yangtze River through the Jianshui River. Copper from Tonglu Mountain and more distant places such as Ruichang and Tongling can be traced up the river, passing through the Sui Zao Corridor and then north. Transport to the Central Plains.

;

;;

;

;;(Liang Shuyi/Picture);

;

;The war between the Chu State and the Chu State for the Tonglu Mountain was The era of King Wu kicked off; the main target of the war was Sui Guo - before this, King Wu of Chu annexed Quan State and established counties on Quan State's territory, which was the beginning of China's county system. At this time, the power of the Chu State penetrated deep into the Jianghan Plain, and the fertile Jianghan Plain was being eroded bit by bit by the Chu people.

;

;Facing the set goal, King Chu Wu showed great patience - he has been waiting, looking for opportunities while waiting - King Chu Wu waited from his middle age until his twilight years.

;

;In 706 BC, Sui suffered from a drought, resulting in a massive reduction in grain production and a lack of food for the soldiers and civilians. King Wu of Chu took the opportunity to attack Sui. The Chu army came to the city, and the princes knew that they were no match, so they had to send people to King Wu of Chu to ask for peace. King Wu of Chu accepted the peace talks, and one of the conditions was that he would ask the Emperor of Zhou to be promoted to the title of Chu Kingdom. The first expedition against Sui and the establishment of an alliance under the city with the country meant that the Chu people had already gotten involved in the road of copper and tin, and from then on they could obtain a steady stream of high-quality copper.

;

;Two years later, Sui, who had an alliance with Chu, refused to attend the alliance led by Chu. King Chu Wu used this as an excuse to attack Sui for the second time. This time, the Chu army was defeated and the Sui army fled. Even the chariot was captured by the Chu army. Also in this year, Suihou informed King Wu of Chu that the Emperor of Zhou refused to promote him to the title. Therefore, King Wu of Chu became angry and proclaimed himself king.

;

;In the next three years, Chu defeated a series of countries including Yun, Jiu, Zhou, Deng and Liao. These countries either became vassals of Chu or had to fight with Chu. Make an alliance.

;

;However, in 699 BC, when attacking Luo State, Chu State general Qu Xia was conceited and underestimated the enemy. He was defeated by the coalition forces of Luo State and Lu State. Qu Xia committed suicide. ——Since then, the Chu State has formed an unwritten rule: any commander who leads troops to fight must commit suicide to apologize once he is defeated. This determination, soaked in the bones and blood of Chu people, was passed down to the last commander-in-chief, Xiang Yu, the overlord of Western Chu who would rather commit suicide than return to Jiangdong.

;

;King Wu of Chu had to slow down the pace of his campaign. For the next eight years, King Wu of Chu did not raise any more troops to attack his followers. He concentrated his efforts and swept away Luo, Lu, Yan, Zhou and Liao, and firmly controlled the Jianghan Plain. It should be during this period that the Tonglu Mountain also belonged to the Chu State.

;

;When everything came to pass, King Wu of Chu attacked him for the third time. Because Suiguo is not only an important stronghold on the copper-tin road, but also a springboard for Chu to fight for hegemony northward.

;

;On the eve of the expedition, he felt heart discomfort during the sacrifice and knew that his days were numbered. Sure enough, when the Chu army crossed the Han River and King Wu of Chu was sitting under a sycamore tree by the roadside to rest, he could never stand up again - this king who advocated force and was determined to expand his territory died like this. On the journey.

;

;After the death of King Chu Wu, the Chu army continued to advance towards the capital of Sui without announcing the funeral. When Suihou saw the army approaching the border, he was frightened and sent people to sue for peace. From then on, Suiguo, who was originally loyal to the Emperor of Zhou and monitored the south for the Emperor of Zhou and guarded the copper and tin road, became a vassal of Chu.

;

;After the death of King Chu Wu, King Chu Wen came to the throne. The first thing King Wen of Chu did when he came to power was to move the capital from the remote Danyang to Ying. The Chu State had moved its capital many times. After the first move to Ying, the subsequent capitals were all called Ying or Yingdu. The place where King Wen of Chu moved to Ying is said to be Jingzhou or Yicheng. No matter who is right, the indisputable fact is that the power of Chu State has crossed the Han River from west to east. During the reign of King Chu Wen, he successively destroyed the State of Shen, Xi and Deng, repeatedly defeated the State of Cai, and made a northern expedition to the State of Zheng - this was also the beginning of the Chu State's quest to dominate the Central Plains.

;

;After King Chu Wen, King Chu Cheng went to a higher level and successively annexed more than ten small countries such as Er, Gu, Huang, Ying, Jiang, and Fang. The State of Zheng, which borders the State of Chu, was on the fence between Jin and Chu. This is how Zheng Wengong went to see King Chu Cheng, and King Chu Cheng gave him a thousand catties of copper. However, King Chu Cheng was born at the wrong time - he met Duke Huan of Qi, the most powerful of the Five Hegemons of the Spring and Autumn Period. In order to teach the Chu State a lesson, Qi Huangong led the coalition forces deep into the Chu territory. Although the two sides did not decide the winner, the Chu State had to admit its mistake to the coalition forces and recognize Qi State's dominance. By the time of King Chuzhuang, the grandson of King Chu Cheng, this soaring and blockbuster King of Chu defeated the northern superpower Jin, thus becoming one of the five hegemons of the Spring and Autumn Period.

;

;The history of the Spring and Autumn Period and the Warring States Period is a history of princes fighting against each other. In the merger of big fish eating small fish and small fish eating shrimps, small countries continued to disappear and big countries grew bigger like a snowball. Among the princes, the Chu State destroyed the most, with more than fifty people. At its peak, Chu State ranked first in territory, equivalent to the sum of other princes. It can be said that if it were not for the incompetence of several generations of Chu kings in the late Warring States Period, it would have been more likely to be the Chu State that wiped out the heroes, rather than the Qin State located in the northwest.

;

;Behind the Chu people’s illustrious military exploits, Tonglu Mountain was the silent and lasting first driving force, creating the miracles of the Bronze Age.

;

;Ruins

;

;The Tonglushan Ancient Copper Mine Ruins Museum is located on the hill where coppergrass flowers sway. There are few tourists, and the copper grass flowers are looking at themselves in the wind. On the other side of the hill, I saw a huge pit like a funnel embedded between the peaks. The pit sank hundreds of meters below the surface and was hundreds of meters in diameter. A road winding like a snake passed by a factory with thick smoke. Reaching into the pit, trucks crawled like beetles. This is the open-pit copper mine that is still being mined today.

;

;;

;

;Tonglushan Open-pit Copper Mine;（IC Photo/图）;

;

;In 1973, the It was while working in this open-pit mine that the miners of the Nonferrous Metallurgical Company dug out thirteen rusty copper axes from the ground. Later, using thirteen copper axes that had been dormant for thousands of years as clues, archaeologists followed the clues and unearthed seven open-pit mines, 18 underground mining areas, more than 50 ancient smelting sites and More than ten smelting shaft furnaces.

;

;The reappearance of ancient copper mines under the earth not only reveals the secret of the rise of Chu State, but also proves that Chinese bronze culture is not foreign, but originated from the mainland. Archaeological evidence shows that the mining of Tonglushan copper mines began in the late Shang Dynasty, and continued through the Western Zhou Dynasty, the Spring and Autumn Period and the Warring States Period to the Han Dynasty, which lasted for thousands of years.

;

;In the museum, large and small copper slags are displayed in glass cabinets - things that look either slightly yellow or slightly green. Archaeologists estimate that there are as many as 400,000 tons of copper slag in the entire Tonglushan site. Based on rough calculations based on copper slag, Tonglushan produces about 120,000 tons of copper.

;

;The figure of 120,000 tons is a bit empty. If you convert it, you will know how huge it is: the Shang Dynasty Stepmother Wu Ding unearthed in Anyang (;The Simuwu Dafang Ding;) is the heaviest bronze in China so far, weighing more than 800 kilograms. 120,000 tons can be used to cast 140,000 statues. Some people have made another calculation: the main equipment of soldiers in the Spring and Autumn Period was copper ge, each weighing about half a kilogram and 120,000 tons, enough to make 240 million pieces. Of course, not all of the 120,000 tons of copper from Tonglu Mountain is exclusively owned by the Chu State. However, in the mining history of more than a thousand years from the late Shang Dynasty to the Western Han Dynasty, Chu State accounted for about half of the mining time. This was the golden age of Tonglu Mountain. The Chu people obtained at least tens of thousands of tons of high-quality copper from the depths of Tonglu Mountain.

;

;When King Zhuang of Chu aspired to conquer the Central Plains, he proudly said to Wang Sunman, a minister of Emperor Zhou, "The beak of Chu's broken hook is enough to make nine tripods." This means that as long as the sharp edges of Chu's weapons are taken off, it will be enough to be melted into Jiuding.

;

;The massive amount of copper in Tonglu Mountain proves that King Chuzhuang was not exaggerating at all. His Chu country, whether it is the civil governance of the alliance princes or the martial arts of conquering cities and territories; whether it is the stubborn and domineering character of the Chu people or the Chu music of Hong Zhongda Lu; whether it is the gloomy Chu Feng that respects ghosts or the soul-stirring Chu Ci—— They are all based on copper, with copper as their bones, and with copper as their foundation...

;

;;

;

;Viewers look at the early Spring and Autumn shaft furnace model unearthed from Tonglu Mountain in the National Museum of China. ;（IC Photo/图）;

;

;In Tonglu Mountain, those long-standing mines go deep underground and extend in all directions like a maze. Some of the wood that was laid down two to three thousand years ago to support the tunnels has not yet rotted. Walking cautiously in the restored mine, the tunnel is narrow and damp. I can't help but think of the Chu miners who worked all day long with a torch in the belly of the earth in Tonglu Mountain more than two thousand years ago. Whether they are swinging a heavy copper ax to hit the hard rock formation, or dragging a bamboo basket full of copper ore along the tunnel, the labor day after day and year after year makes them like worker bees dying. The power and glory of the Chu State, the hegemony of King Wu and King Wen, and the grand plans of King Cheng and Zhuang, they have contributed a lot, but history will not leave their names.

;

;In 1981, Chen Chong studied film production in the United States and directed his first film in 1998 "Heavenly Bath". ;(Photo courtesy of interviewee);

;

;As an actor, Chen Chong is well known, and as a director, Chen Chong is well known. few. Chen Chong is one of the three directors of the movie "Her in the World" to be released on September 9, 2022, the other two are Sylvia Chang and Li Shaohong. The film tells an emotional story under difficult circumstances, involving mother-in-law and daughter-in-law, couples and lovers.

;

;In May 2020, Chen Chong received a call from producer Dong Wenjie, hoping to invite several well-known female directors to jointly shoot a movie. She finally decided to tell the story of a pair of lovers separated in two places, "to explore the closest expression of the oldest theme of love."

;

;Like all previous works she directed, Chen Chong wrote the script herself. She repeatedly looked at the real photos taken by her colleagues. There was a supermarket scene in the movie, so she found many supermarket CCTVs and watched them, wanting to know details such as the denseness of the crowds. The script was originally written to rain, and the rendering of rain was used to increase the atmosphere, but later she learned that there was no rain in reality on the day set in the movie, so she removed this setting.

;

;"Without the rain, wouldn't the story have happened? Wouldn't the feelings be conveyed? So, whether there is rain or not is not important, but whether there is the conveyance of emotions is important." She said.

;

;"Her in the World" was originally scheduled to be released on the May Day holiday in 2021, but was later postponed to the Mid-Autumn Festival in 2022. During the editing of the film, a Southern Weekend staff writer interviewed Chen Chong in Shanghai.

;

;"Love and loss are eternal"

;

;;Southern Weekend:;;The setting of this movie sounds a bit like Love in the Time of Cholera. When you were approaching this story, did you have a clear setting from the beginning? ;

;

;;Chen Chong: ;;After receiving the invitation from the producer, I searched online for a week and finally found this story about lovers who were exiled in two places. Touched me. The girl returned to Beijing to visit her parents during the Spring Festival, but she has not been able to see her boyfriend who was locked down in Wuhan since then. This melody of love, loss, and exile resonated with me—I too am unable to travel home to visit my elderly parents due to the pandemic. ;

;

;For lovers who are blocked in two cities, the mobile phone screen is something that arouses their infinite desire and is warmer than real life. In fact, this is also the relationship between most people and their mobile phones. Especially during the epidemic, people’s interactions with others and their understanding of the world come from mobile phones. The contradictions and conflicts in human nature also come from people's different interpretations of online messages. We all seem to be living on isolated islands in our mobile phones. The more attractive "reality" on the screen seems more "real" than life itself. The themes of love and loss, life and death are ancient and timeless, and my challenge was to give it a new screen narrative for today.

;

;;Southern Weekend:;;Have you ever considered adding a paragraph about their love history? ;

;

;;Chen Chong: ;;Absolutely no flashbacks. This story is that these two people are always in different frames, and they want you to be deeply moved by them. These are the rules I set for myself. ;

;

;;Southern Weekend:;;In the era of the epidemic, two people can only use mobile phones What love words can a lover say during a video call? What excites you about the process of writing a screenplay? ;

;

;;Chen Chong: ;;Their conversations are actually very simple conversations, the most daily and common conversations. My husband and I often do this too. Video communication. These two people are in love. They video chat when they wake up in the morning, before going to bed at night, and while cooking and brushing teeth. They chat casually in separate places, but it makes people feel the joy and love of two people together. , this is my excitement point. ;

;

;;Southern Weekend:;;What do you think of the emotional tone expressed in this story? ;

;

;;Chen Chong: ;;This is a story about true love. If a person can love like this once, he is very lucky. Not everyone can love like this. Because he has had real happiness, and the sadness of loss is sublimated into the beauty in the black mirror. ;

;

;;Southern Weekend:;;Many people in the world are actually not satisfied with love in their hearts. So I believe it, but the desire and demand for love still seems very strong. ;

;

;;Chen Chong: ;;After we finished filming, several of the main creators climbed Xiangshan Mountain. After climbing to the top, they saw many people writing blessing signs. . I said let’s hang one too, and we wrote our blessings for the movie and hung it there. I looked through it carefully, and there were hundreds of tags, and there were countless love words in them. They were all "So-and-so loves so-and-so" and "So-and-so will be with so-and-so forever." More than half of them, you can Did you say that love is gone? impossible. When you fall in love, can you stop yourself? Even this bit of vitality is gone, and your life has been in vain. This thing is different from desire. It is really a gift from God to you. ;

;

;;Southern Weekend:;;Princess Sissi is the Empress of Austria. She has extremely happy resources and unlimited money, and her husband loves her very much. He has worshiped her and been obsessed with her all his life, but she is not happy. I don’t know how the paradox in life is formed. Is love the greatest value of happiness in life? ;

;

;;Chen Chong: ;;Yes, this is a gift. You don’t need to be good enough or work hard. You don’t need to do your homework. You don’t need to move bricks. You don't need anything, it will come to you. Maybe love won't be important in the future, I don't know, I can't imagine it. Why refuse such a gift? I can't imagine. ;

;

;;Southern Weekend:;;The role starring Yi Yang Qianxi, at the beginning Is it just set at the age of two or three years after graduating from college? ;

;

;;Chen Chong: ;;Absolutely. We met in college, have been in love for four years, and are about to get married. He is the happiest young man after graduating from college. period. The simplest dream of having this simple college sweetheart is to get married, the girl can wear a wedding dress, and the boy can put a ring on her. The definition of disaster is when the simplest dreams are destroyed. ;

;

;;Southern Weekend:;;From a distant perspective, love is a An ordinary story is about a man and a woman falling in love. Your film is set in a specific time and space. What happened in this love story? ;

;

;;Chen Chong: ;;Actually, movies are just such a thing. There is no need to make sense, and there is no reason to make love. It’s not that you think this person is a good match for this person, that has nothing to do with it. I'm going to give you something that I believe you will believe. ;

;

;;

;

;Chen Chong directed a short film in "Her in the World", telling the story of a pair of lovers who were separated in two places during the epidemic. ;(Photo courtesy of interviewee);

;

;“I can see clues of my dishonesty”

;

; ;Southern Weekend:;;Have you studied directing in the United States? ;

;

;;Chen Chong:;;I studied TV production and took some directing classes, but that directing class was completely useless. In fact, film is an apprenticeship, and film school comes later. When the movie first started, everyone was learning on the spot, apprentice-style. The kind of learning from a master should be more useful. ;

;

;;Southern Weekend:;;You directed the first film "Tianba" When you were young, you cut it yourself. By then, did you already have strong confidence to complete it? ;

;

;;Chen Chong: ;;There is no strong self-confidence, only strong desire. I'm not a particularly confident person, and self-doubt is a big part of my thinking. ;

;

;;Southern Weekend:;;But outsiders see that you have many successes, which proves that you Qualified to do it yourself. ;

;

;;Chen Chong: ;;I will always think that it is a coincidence, that it is a misunderstanding, that it is confusing people. I think so, In fact, this may be the case. ;

;

;;Southern Weekend:;;Have you ever gone to the cinema to watch your own movie? ;

;

;;Chen Chong: ;;Very few. I've seen it, but it's quite unbearable. I actually have a very sensitive radar. I can see the clues of my own dishonesty. Maybe others can’t see it, but I can definitely see it. So watching your own movies is not an easy task. Movies are not an actor's tool, but a director's tool, so you are a pawn in it. If you see your own problems, it does not affect your feeling that the movie is pretty good. ;

;

;;Southern Weekend:;;The films you directed are all because of yourself Do you have the desire to create, or do you have to find funds or outside sources? ;

;

;;Chen Chong: ;;Both. If funds come to me and I don’t have the desire, I will definitely not go. Because being a director is quite hard for me and not an easy thing.我不是一个天才导演，我也不是一个技术型导演，才华有限、技术有限，如果我还没有一个强烈的叙事欲望，那这件事情根本没法做了。所以肯定是要有强烈的叙事欲望才会去做的。 ;

;

;;南方周末：;;你导演的电影都是你自己来编剧？ ;

;

;;陈冲：;;我必须，因为这对我来说不难。我当然希望得到志同道合主创的意见和提示，还有很多大家共同做的资料，因为我觉得资料是给我写剧本最好的东西。但是剧本其实就是我闭上眼睛脑子里看到的那部电影，我先把它写下来，主创全部进入以后，它肯定会有改变。但是起先写下来的就是你脑子里看到的那部电影，所以没有那么难。 ;

;

;;南方周末：;;你第一次站到奥斯卡舞台上是？ ;

;

;;陈冲：;;《末代皇帝》。 ;

;

;;南方周末：;;那一刻是有很大的满足感吗？ ;

;

;;陈冲：;;也没有，我年轻时对工作、对这些事情都不是特别在乎，就在乎谈恋爱。其实工作，是给我一个机会缓冲一下，它一次次把我从感情的漩涡里拯救出来。 ;

;

;;南方周末：;;你说过那时候的主业是谈恋爱，现在会觉得那些时光是一种浪费吗？ ;

;

;;陈冲：;;不浪费。我不知道什么是浪费的，一个劲儿地做自己不想做的事，可能是有点浪费的。比如谈恋爱，如果是做了自己想做的事，但那个事很荒唐或者错了，或者给你自己带来了很大的损失，我觉得仍然不能算浪费。 ;

;

;;南方周末：;;你上过舞台吗？ ;

;

;;陈冲：;;我不敢。 ;

;

;;南方周末：;;为什么？ ;

;

;;陈冲：;;因为我恐惧人群，我特别恐惧人群。 ;

;

;;南方周末：;;中国国内电影确实很少上点年岁的女性角色，你自己有没有概念很厚实的女性角色？ ;

;

;;陈冲：;;很少，太少了，尤其是目前的电影文化，崇尚青春，对女人的要求和标准仍然是……你知道吧。你的丰富、你的灵魂、你的复杂，它没有一个载体，因为你的躯体没有被接受，它在哪儿安家呢？ ;

;

;;南方周末：;;你做电影会下意识要讨好女性受众吗，考虑她们怎么想的，还要不能触怒她们。 ;

;

;;陈冲：;;你的责任是诚实，你的责任不是讨好，你的责任就应该是表达你自己。我拍电影，我从来不会考虑我应该为女性拍电影，我毫无这个负担。 ;

;

;“把这场戏放在真人秀里，怎么演都如同嚼蜡”

;

;;南方周末：;;媒体记者有时候会下意识把你的角色都连接起来，比如婉容、红玫瑰，可能角色里那些强悍的，能够争取自己权益的人，认为她们是女性主义的英雄，你会有这样的连接吗？ ;

;

;;陈冲：;;我当时演婉容或者演《红玫瑰与白玫瑰》，或者演姜文的电影，我从来没有想过女性的权利、女性的地位、女性的任何，从来没有考虑过。 ;

;

;;南方周末：;;你拍《红玫瑰与白玫瑰》的时候喜欢张爱玲吗？ ;

;

;;陈冲：;;我喜欢张爱玲，但我不是一个张迷。 ;

;

;;南方周末：;;女性作家里你喜欢谁？ ;

;

;;陈冲：;;玛格丽特·杜拉斯，写《情人》的，《飘》，都是一些老的，还有波兰作者奥尔加·托卡尔丘克，2018年诺贝尔获奖作家。我特别喜欢李碧华写的《烟花三月》。 ;

;

;;南方周末：;;芦苇谈电影《霸王别姬》时说，李碧华的原版小说是一个二流小说。 ;

;

;;陈冲：;;有时候一流小说真的改不了电影，你想想它已经一流了，你还能把它怎么样？就是要二流、三流的才能给它改成电影，让它更上一层楼。李碧华的书我并不太喜欢，但是《烟花三月》我看了，非常震惊。一个朋友送给我，我在火车上开始看，看到第六七十页的时候，我说有点难，这个有点太苦了，她说你坚持一下，会有回报的。我坚持看完了，极大的回报。只有长篇才能够给你这样的满足感，没有办法在任何其他地方得到，满足的同时又那么的遗憾，怎么看完了，太好看了。 ;

;

;;南方周末：;;你写过你女儿9岁的时候，要的生日礼物就是书和游泳，读书这个传统是你小时候的家庭环境造成的吗？ ;

;

;;陈冲：;;其实我小的时候没什么书，没什么好看的。我外婆有一个小箱子，里头有一些外国带回来的东西，有一些连环画什么的，董存瑞还是焦裕禄的传记，能看的东西其实特别少。我外婆有一套契诃夫的短篇，那时候已经不全了，就那么零零碎碎地读。因为他们喜欢读，我也喜欢读，我母亲那时候阻止我读，因为她觉得这个不好，最好做点功课、做家务、出去玩儿。我妈是一个医学科学家，退休以后就光看小说，喜欢看小说。这两天我还在看她的书架，中外书籍特全，王安忆、池莉、陈忠实，纳博科夫的《洛丽塔》、海明威的《老人与海》，看得特别杂。 ;

;

;;南方周末：;;你自己的阅读是怎样的，杂吗？ ;

;

;;陈冲：;;没有一个规范的东西，也看过一些比方说言情小说。看马尔克斯的书，就很震惊，我那时候英语不好，刚到美国不久，《百年孤独》看得好累，查字典又不像现在按一下就给你解释了，我看得非常累、非常慢。我就震惊，书是这样写吗？所以很杂、非常杂。在国内的时候就看过，不知道从哪儿觅到了卡夫卡也看。 ;

;

;;南方周末：;;写作在你的生活中占一个什么样的比例？ ;

;

;;陈冲：;;不重的比例。疫情期间因为关在家里，有这样一个奢侈，不是一个常态，不是说每天必须写。但是我喜欢文字，我隔离的时候就会写。我上小学、上中学都没怎么读书，中学读了还不到一个学期就去上影了。国内古典的书籍都没有看过，真正的教育是留学以后的。 ;

;

;;南方周末：;;最近这几年国内好几档表演节目，你去参加过真人秀吗？ ;

;

;;陈冲：;;参加过一个，没把我给羞死。有一次节目里让一个人演我之前扮演的婉容的一段戏，然后让我评论。我说这个怎么能评论呢，这个是不能评论的，因为无数个大师为我营造了这样一个环境和气氛。没有了电影本身的魔力，把这场戏放在真人秀里，怎么演都如同嚼蜡。 ;

;

;

;On September 29, 2023, in the women’s singles tennis final of the Hangzhou Asian Games, Zheng Qinwen won 2 Defeated Zhu Lin 0-0 and won the championship ; (Visual China/Photo);

;

;The women's tennis at the Asian Games that ended on September 29, 2023 In the singles final, Chinese player Zheng Qinwen defeated teammate Zhu Lin in straight sets 6:2, 6:4 and won the gold medal in the women's singles tennis event at the Hangzhou Asian Games. This is the first time that 20-year-old Zheng Qinwen has participated in the Asian Games. With Zheng Qinwen and Zhu Lin winning both the championship and runner-up, the Chinese women's tennis team achieved its fifth consecutive Asian Games title.

;

;In May 2022, Zheng Qinwen reached the top 16 at the French Open, setting a new age for a Chinese female tennis player to reach the top 16 in a Grand Slam event, and attracted the attention of the world's tennis community. In the first half of 2023, her state had some ups and downs, but she recovered at the US Open and reached the top 8, once again setting a personal best. Zheng Qinwen, who only turned 21 in October this year, has just begun his career. The excellent results have given fans high expectations for this Hubei girl: After Li Na, the representative Chinese female tennis player, retires, will she, who is also from Hubei, be the next hope for Chinese women's tennis?

;

;;

;

;On September 29, 2023, Zheng Qinwen returned the ball in the women's singles tennis final of the Hangzhou Asian Games;(Visual China/Picture)< /span>;

;

;;"Rocket Girl";

;

;In September 2014, tennis player Li Na officially retired. In her 15-year career, she reached the WTA women's singles finals 21 times and won a total of 9 WTA and 19 ITF singles championships, including the 2011 French Open and the 2014 Australian Open women's singles championships. She is Asia's first Grand Slam women's singles champion. She was once ranked second in the world's women's tennis singles rankings, with a total career record of 503 wins and 188 losses. When she retired, she was ranked sixth in the world.

;

;Li Na's retirement has left an insurmountable peak and a huge vacuum for Chinese women's tennis. She has retired for more than nine years. At least so far, there has not been a player in Chinese women's tennis who can surpass her or even be on par with her.

;

;In 2011, when Li Na lifted her first Suzanne Langland Cup at Roland Garros in Paris, 9-year-old Zheng Qinwen was receiving tennis training in Wuhan under Li Na’s former coach Teacher Yu Liqiao. In her memory, it seemed that people all over the country were paying attention to Li Na's game that day. "Li Na's victory planted a dream in me. One day I will also win a Grand Slam."

;

;That was the third year that Zheng Qinwen officially started tennis training. In 2008, Zheng Qinwen's father took her to Beijing to watch the tennis match at the Olympic Games. Zheng Qinwen thought quietly. After the game, she and her father repeatedly discussed the details on the court and told her father that she was very interested in tennis. His father was once an athlete. He took Zheng Qinwen to play table tennis, badminton, basketball, and volleyball... His daughter was able to get started, but she was not outstanding. This time, he decided to let Zheng Qin play tennis. The coaches at Zheng Qinwen's hometown Shiyan Sports Center recognized her talent very much and believed that the power bursting out of her body was much higher than that of her peers.

;

;In September 2014, Zheng Qinwen participated in the 12-year-old category of the National Youth Tennis Ranking Tournament and won the singles and doubles championships in one fell swoop. In the same year, the Shiyan Tennis Team she led participated in the 14th Hubei Provincial Games and won 2 gold medals. Her serving speed reached 169 kilometers per hour, which was outstanding in the country and the world at that time. Therefore, she was hailed as a "genius girl" by many domestic sports commentators.

;

;Zheng Qinwen successfully entered the Beijing Wheel of Ingenuity Tennis School and received the guidance of Li Na’s mentor Carlos. Zheng Qinwen gradually grew from a talented player to a mature player with no shortcomings and comprehensive skills. In 2015, Zheng Qinwen won the championship in the 14-year-old group (12 to 14 years old) of the European Youth Tennis Tour. She has participated in many national and world tennis events and achieved outstanding results. When she was 16 years old, she participated in the French Open, Wimbledon, and US Open youth competitions, reaching the top 16 in each of them.

;

;In 2019, my father contacted Spanish male tennis player Pere Riba, who had just retired as a coach, and the two parties decided to cooperate. Zheng Qinwen started training in Spain under the care of his mother. From Monday to Saturday, he had 2 hours of tennis training in the morning, 1 hour of physical training, and 2 hours of tennis training in the afternoon.

;

;In August 2020, tennis competitions that were temporarily suspended due to the new crown epidemic resumed, and Zheng Qinwen began to participate frequently. In an interview with the media, Zheng Qinwen recalled that in order to more conveniently compete in Europe, the team would drive around Europe, driving from Barcelona to Germany, Italy and the Czech Republic. The furthest trip took 22 hours on the road. She didn't want to be eliminated in the first round and have to take a 22-hour drive home, so she worked very hard after playing. In order to maintain the best competitive condition, she hardly used the Internet during the competition, and even turned off her mobile phone when she arrived at the competition venue.

;

;In May 2022, 19-year-old Zheng Qinwen participated in the French Open for the first time. She defeated Zanievska, Halep, and Koné successively, reaching the top 16 of the tournament, refreshing China The youngest age for a female tennis player to reach the top 16 in a Grand Slam tournament. In the fourth round, she faced Swiatek, ranked No. 1 in the world and the last French Open champion. The first set took more than 80 minutes. Zheng Qinwen broke Swiatek's 37-day record of no opponent winning a single set. He won the "tiebreak" 7-5 and won the first set with difficulty. In the second set, Zheng Qinwen suffered from a right thigh injury that affected his performance. In the end, he lost 1:2 and missed the top 8.

;

;"Zheng Qinwen unfortunately stopped in the top 16 of the French Open, but the comprehensive skills and playing temperament she displayed made fans all over the world remember 'Chinese Zheng'. The potential shown by Zheng Qinwen makes us believe that this season She will also bring more surprises!" People's Daily reported.

;

;In 2020, when Zheng Qinwen first entered the professional arena, he was ranked 630th in the world. In the following more than two years, Zheng Qinwen won 8 ITF championships. He made history in his first Grand Slam tournament, reaching the second round of the Australian Open, the top 16 of the French Open, the top 32 of Wimbledon, and the top 32 of the US Open. WTA named him the "Best Rookie of the 2022 Season". Because of her extremely fast rise in rankings, Zheng Qinwen was called the "Rocket Girl". At the beginning of 2022, she promised to enter the top 30 in the world rankings, and at the end of the season, her ranking rose to 27th.

;

;;

;

;On July 23, 2023, in the women's singles final of the Women's Tennis Players Association (WTA) 250 Palermo Station, Zheng Qinwen defeated Italian player Paolini 2-1 and won The first tour championship in her career ;(Women's Tennis Players Association (WTA) official social account/picture);

;

;;"Queen Wen";

;

;When the new season starts in 2023, Zheng Qinwen vows to enter the top ten in the world rankings. In the first half of the year, she went through a difficult downturn. In the 2023 Australian Open and French Open, Zheng Qinwen failed in the second round one after another. Before the start of Wimbledon, Zheng Qinwen changed coaches, replacing Spanish coach Riba with famous Belgian coach Wim Fiset, who has coached Naomi Osaka, Azarenka and other famous players. However, the grass court season was still hard for her to win, and Wimbledon ended with a first-round trip.

;

;In an interview, Zheng Qinwen said: "Although I didn't play well in the grass-court season, I don't think my (strength) will decline. I will still work hard and prepare for the next stop. Change. The team must have had an impact, but I don’t think the loss was due to the coach.”

;

;Before participating in the US Open, Zheng Qinwen went to Italy to participate in the WTA250 Palermo Station. She went all the way and won her first WTA tour-level championship in her career, and began to get out of the slump. "This championship is hard-won. After experiencing failures, tears, regrets and disappointments, I finally tasted the taste of victory. I believe this is just the beginning."

;

;In a series of games before the US Open, Zheng Qinwen defeated Venus Williams and other famous players. After the start of the US Open, she quickly entered the state. Compared with before, she appeared calmer and more patient, with more swings and more frequent changes in long and short balls. She successfully broke into the top 16 of the US Open and expressed emotion in the interview: "At the beginning of the year, I thought that reaching the second week of a Grand Slam was a basic operation, but I didn't expect that I would not have such a result until the last Grand Slam of the year. ”

;

;After that, she defeated the 2022 tournament runner-up and No. 5 seed Kareem Abdul-Jabbar, creating the best Grand Slam record in her career and becoming the sixth woman in the Open era to enter the Grand Slam singles. /China Tennis Association players in the 4 finals. And this is only the second year that 20-year-old Zheng Qinwen has participated in a Grand Slam event.

;

;;

;

;On September 28, 2023, in the women's singles tennis semifinals of the Hangzhou Asian Games, Zheng Qinwen signed autographs for fans;(Visual China/Picture );

;

;Zheng Qinwen’s experience is a sample of the new generation of tennis players - he started playing tennis out of interest, received professional and international training since childhood, made independent choices, and did not take any detours. A relatively smooth growth process shaped her confident attitude and unruly temperament. During interviews, she often makes some sharp remarks. On August 12, 2022, in the third round of women's singles at the WTA1000 Toronto Station, Zheng Qinwen defeated Andreescu 7-5, 5-7, 6-2 and entered the quarterfinals of the WTA1000 competition for the first time. When asked if he would celebrate after reaching the top 8, Zheng Qinwen said: "I will only celebrate after winning. I will be sad if I don't win." After the game, he talked about the match with former US Open champion Andreescu. , Zheng Qinwen responded domineeringly: "I am stronger than her." When asked if he would work hard to win the US Open seed, Zheng Qinwen said: "It really doesn't matter. My philosophy has always been that no matter who my opponent is, I Just do your best and strive to win."

;

;Her speech became an indicator of the player's personality, and she was called "Queen Wen" by fans. At the US Open, fans called her "Queen Wen" from the sidelines. Zheng Qinwen enjoys this title very much, "Of course I know, I like the name Queen Wen very much. After all, this is the Queen!"

;

;More than half of the 2023 season has passed, and Zheng Qinwen is far from the top 10 in the world. There is still some distance. In an interview, she was asked why she always sets her goals very high, and why she always likes to speak out and take the initiative to withstand scrutiny from the outside world?

;

;;

;

;2023年9月4日，在2023美国网球公开赛女子单打第四轮比赛中，中国选手郑钦文以2比0战胜突尼斯选手贾贝乌尔，晋级八强;（新华社/图）;

;

;郑钦文回答：“有时候压力其实是必须的，能够激励我去做得更好。如果没有压力，总是停留在同一个层面，就无法不断向前。我打网球是因为热爱，我希望自己始终处于进步的状态，顶尖球员也都是在不断进步的，这也是我非常钦佩他们的一点。我无法想象如果停滞不前所带给我的痛苦。”

;

;Cainiao launches self-operated local express delivery business in Spain. ;(Cainiao official website/picture);

;

;On September 26, 2023, Cainiao submitted IPO application documents to the Hong Kong Stock Exchange. This is Alibaba The first spin-off and listed business after launching the "1+6+n" organizational reform.

;

;The prospectus disclosed that Cainiao achieved 20% revenue in the fiscal years 2021, 2022 and 2023, as well as in the three months from March 30 to June 30, 2023 (hereinafter referred to as the most recent quarter). Revenue was 52.733 billion yuan, 66.867 billion yuan, 77.8 billion yuan and 23.164 billion yuan, and net profits were -1.688 billion yuan, -2.004 billion yuan, -2.325 billion yuan and 391 million yuan respectively.

;

;In other words, its cumulative losses in the three full fiscal years before listing exceeded 6 billion yuan, and it only turned a profit in the most recent quarter.

;

;Cainiao’s current business mainly includes three major sectors: international logistics, domestic logistics, technology and other services. From fiscal year 2021 to 2023 (ending March 30) and the most recent quarter, its international logistics revenue accounted for 55.1%, 52.3%, 47.4%, and 48.1% respectively, which are all higher than domestic logistics revenue.

;

;In 2013, Alibaba Group, Yintai Group, Fosun Group, Fuchun Group and other Zhejiang capital circle tycoons, together with domestic express logistics companies SF Express and "Three Communications and One Express" jointly established Cainiao . At that time, Shen Guojun, the founder of Yintai Group, was the CEO of Cainiao Network. However, just one year later, Shen stepped down as CEO and became vice chairman.

;

;Current CEO Wan Lin joined Cainiao in 2014. Previously, he served as a senior manager of Amazon’s global logistics department. In 2017, Wan Lin officially took charge of Cainiao and made Cainiao one of Alibaba's fastest-growing business segments. Thanks to this, Wan Lin appears on Alibaba’s latest list of partners disclosed in 2023.

;

;;Betting on the international market;

;

;Also in 2017, Cainiao’s overseas logistics ambitions began to emerge. This year, Cainiao launched its first e-Hub plan (comprehensive e-commerce logistics hub) in Kuala Lumpur, which became the gateway to the Southeast Asian e-commerce market. It mainly provides express delivery services for cross-border merchants on AliExpress.

;

;As of June 30, 2023, Cainiao has established two logistics hubs with an area of ​​over 15,000 square meters around the world, located in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia and Liège, Belgium. It is expected to build a third logistics hub in Hong Kong hub.

;

;Cainiao’s performance in cross-border logistics services is inseparable from Alibaba’s cross-border e-commerce AliExpress. AliExpress was established in 2010 and is known as the international version of "Taobao".

;

;A cross-border e-commerce practitioner in the women's clothing industry told Southern Weekend reporters that the platforms available on the market include Amazon, AliExpress, Shopee, Dunhuang, and E-bay. Due to their low cost, , early cross-border e-commerce entrepreneurs tend to choose AliExpress.

;

The goods can arrive in major European and American countries in about a week, while in remote areas it takes half a month to a month. "After the express arrives at the local area, it still chooses to cooperate with the local post office, and the delivery time is determined by the local post office."

;

;Cainiao provides express services to AliExpress merchants in the form of third-party services. "For example, Di Sifang is owned by Cainiao express delivery company," she said. Tianyancha shows that Cainiao Network holds 45% of the shares in Shenzhen Di Sifang Information Technology Co., Ltd.

;

; According to the prospectus, in 2022, Cainiao’s international logistics service revenue will increase by 20% compared with the previous year, and the most recent quarter increased by 41% compared with the same period last year. ;

;In addition to serving the e-commerce platform within the Alibaba ecosystem, Cainiao has also established local logistics services in Hong Kong and some overseas markets such as Spain, France, Poland and other countries.

;

;The Chishi Consulting data cited in the prospectus mentioned that the compound annual growth rate of cross-border e-commerce logistics from 2018 to 2022 will exceed that of China. In particular, China’s cross-border e-commerce far exceeds cross-border e-commerce in other regions. business. Europe and the United States are expected to become the main destinations for cross-border e-commerce products from China. In addition, Southeast Asia and Latin America are also expected to grow rapidly.

;

;According to Zhuoshi Consulting, in 2022, Cainiao will become the world's largest cross-border e-commerce logistics company by package volume. Among the top five, there are two Chinese companies, Cainiao and EMS (China Postal Express Logistics), and the remaining three companies are from Germany, France and the United States.

;

;In the international market, Cainiao will also face challenges from SF Express and Jitu.

;

;Jitu, which was just listed on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange on September 15, has also set its sights on the global market. Jitu is a logistics company born in Indonesia. As of 2022, its express delivery services cover 13 countries, with the highest market share in Southeast Asia.

;

;In August, SF Express announced that it would go public in Hong Kong for a secondary listing. Before the news was released, SF Express made a large-scale acquisition of 10 subsidiaries of Kerry Logistics that engage in express delivery services in the Asia-Pacific region and Europe.

;

;According to previous media reports, since 2019, SF Express has been making continuous progress in overseas expansion, and has successively invested in Flexport, a US freight logistics service provider, and 100% equity interests in two companies, DHL Hong Kong and DHL Beijing, owned by the German DHL company. Myanmar logistics company KOSPA Limited has also established a joint venture with Indonesian Triputra Group.

;

;;Build the world's largest logistics network;

;

; According to the Cainiao prospectus, the gross profit margin in the latest quarter has increased compared with the same period in 2022, rising from 10.6%. to 13.7%.

;

; Its operating costs mainly include contract fulfillment costs (transportation routes, distribution, warehousing processing and other procurement and management services, that is, third-party services) and labor costs. Labor costs include employee welfare expenses and outsourced labor services, which basically account for about 20%.

;

;In its prospectus, Cainiao used "the price of a cup of coffee to be sent around the world" to evaluate the solutions it provides in cross-border logistics.

;

;A cross-border e-commerce practitioner told Southern Weekend reporters that the price of sending a T-shirt is 20 to 30 yuan, which is almost the same as China Post, but compared with foreign logistics companies Lower cost.

;

;In addition to being cheap, the logistics solution provided by Cainiao for AliExpress merchants has also shortened the delivery time from one or two months to ten days, and some international express products only take five days.

;

;On the same day that Cainiao submitted its IPO report, AliExpress and Cainiao launched the "Global Five-Day Delivery" international express product, with the first batch landing in the United Kingdom, Spain, the Netherlands, Belgium and South Korea. In other words, consumers in these five countries can receive packages from China in just five days as long as they order products with the "five-day delivery" logo.

;

;The above-mentioned practitioners said that five-day delivery of goods requires merchants to provide package online information within 48 hours of the customer placing an order. If your Internet access rate reaches the standard, you can apply to join Five-Day Delivery, and the platform will automatically allow merchants to join. It is not difficult for merchants to achieve Internet access rates. Usually after a link is created, they will stock up on some goods. Buyers can send out orders as soon as they place an order, and rookies will come to collect goods every day.

;

;How to reduce costs and increase transportation speed?

;

;The prospectus quoted information from Chishi Consulting. Cainiao has established the largest logistics network in the world, including two logistics hub centers of over 15,000 square meters, more than 1,100 warehouses and more than 380 warehouses. Sorting center. In June 2023, there will be an average of about 170 charter flights and board flights per week, more than 2,700 transportation routes, more than 4,400 outlets and more than 17,000 stations.

;

;Technology also plays a role. For example, artificial intelligence AI algorithms can improve sorting accuracy, improve inventory management, optimize route planning and vehicle scheduling, etc. In terms of smart hardware, there are RFID, smart IoT devices, automation and self-driving technologies, including AVG (automated warehousing technology) and the electric unmanned delivery vehicle "Little Man Donkey". At the same time, it also provides a digital supply chain to facilitate monitoring, identifying problems, and improving efficiency.

;

;In May 2023, the autonomous driving business of Alibaba Damo Academy was merged into Cainiao Group, and some personnel were transferred to Cainiao. That is to say, both "Damanlu" (self-driving truck) and "Xiaomanlu" Return to rookie. According to the prospectus, as of March 30, 2023, more than 800 Xiaoman Donkeys have been put into use, delivering more than 10 million packages.

;

;;

;

;Cainiao Global Headquarters. ;(Visual China/Picture);

;

;;Cannot live without Alibaba;

;

;Before IPO , Cainiao has gone through three rounds of equity financing. Alibaba Group holds a total of 69.54% of Cainiao's shares through three wholly-owned subsidiaries: Ali CN Investment, Ali KB Investment, and Alibaba International. Currently, Cainiao is still a subsidiary of Alibaba Group.

;

;Cainiao disclosed in detail its inextricable ties with Alibaba in its prospectus.

;

;Alibaba is Cainiao’s largest customer. From fiscal year 2021 to 2023 and the most recent quarter, revenue from Alibaba accounted for 29.2%, 30.8%, 28.2%, and 29.7% of total revenue respectively.

;Cainiao provides logistics services for multiple e-commerce platforms such as Tmall, Taobao, and AliExpress under the Alibaba ecosystem. ;The existing resource cooperation between Cainiao and Alibaba Group was fixed in the form of signing a business cooperation framework.

;Includes certain intellectual property rights related to certain software and technologies used by Alibaba and Cainiao in their respective business operations. Alibaba Cloud provides basic cloud computing services to Cainiao, and Best Logistics provides freight services to Cainiao.

;

;Cainiao provides hardware and technical support services, warehousing and management services, comprehensive supply chain solutions and logistics services to Alibaba related parties.

;

;But in terms of management, rookies can still maintain a certain degree of independence.

;

;Among Cainiao’s eight board members, Cai Chongxin, Dai Shan and Jiang Fan are respectively the chairman of the board of directors of Alibaba, the CEO and board member of Taotian Group, and the CEO and board member of Alibaba International Digital Business Group. . ;

;As the CEO of Cainiao Group, Wan Lin is also a member of the senior management of Alibaba Group, but does not hold other management positions in Alibaba Group. The remaining four members of Cainiao's board of directors also do not hold any positions in Alibaba Group.

;

;At 10:53 on September 24, 2023, Eastern Time, samples from the "Pluto" detector returned The capsule, carrying samples collected from the surface of the asteroid "Bennu", successfully landed in the desert near Salt Lake City, Utah. NASA has kept a low profile on this extremely complex and high-tech deep space exploration project and has not made any big publicity. But its mission originated nearly a quarter of a century ago, and the entire project is as weird, brain-burning, fantastic, and romantic as the science fiction film "Star Trek."

;

;In 1999, the NASA-funded Lincoln Near-Earth Asteroid Research Group discovered the asteroid Bennu (Bennu, the sun god in ancient Egyptian mythology). Its equatorial diameter is about 500 meters, its orbit is between Venus and Mars, intersecting with the Earth's orbit, and its perigee is about 7.5 million kilometers. This quickly attracted the attention of the U.S. Planetary Defense Coordination Office, which classified it as a "potentially hazardous object."

;

;After continuous observation and research, scientists believe that "Bennu" is composed of carbon and other minerals. It existed at the beginning of the birth of the solar system and is likely to contain the original molecules that existed when life on earth first formed. Matter is indeed the precious “first-hand material” of the solar system. More importantly, after repeated and precise calculations, "Bennu" has a 1/2700 probability of hitting the earth between 2175 and 2199, making it a high-risk space target.

;

; Therefore, NASA has formulated an exploration mission for this high-risk, high-value asteroid, which is called "Origins, Spectral Interpretation (Solar System), Spectral Analysis, Resource Identification, Safety, and Regolith Exploration" , Resource Identification, Security, Regolith Explorer)", meaning:. This lengthy professional name is abbreviated as "OSIRIS-Rex", borrowing from "Osiris", the god of the underworld in ancient Egyptian mythology, and is abbreviated as "Pluto" in Chinese.

;

;On September 8, 2016, the rocket carrying the "Pluto" probe took off. On December 31, 2018, the probe entered the orbit around Bennu, which is only 1.6-2.1 kilometers away. This is the first time that a human probe has successfully orbited a small celestial body with such a small size, mass, and gravity for a long time.

;

;In the following more than a year, the "Pluto" made many fine orbit changes and conducted very detailed detection of asteroids at various altitudes. In key areas of investigation, the detector flyby height Even lowering it to only 250 meters from the surface of the asteroid requires extremely high flight control technology. The detector's PolyCam camera used 2155 photos to piece together its ultra-high-definition global image with a resolution of up to 5 cm/pixel. It is the highest-definition global image of an extraterrestrial object ever obtained by humans. Therefore, "Bennu" It has become one of the most well-understood asteroids in the solar system so far. In late 2018, detectors found traces of water on its surface.

;

;Although the orbiting survey is very detailed and precise, landing on the asteroid surface to sample is more difficult. NASA scientists found that the originally expected flat landing area with a diameter of about 50 meters turned out to be rocky. The possible landing area was only about 6 meters in diameter at most. Unexpected difficulty would damage the Pluto lander.

;

;Scientists responded urgently: they changed the original plan and developed an alternative navigation and positioning solution based on optical images - natural feature tracking technology, which can fly away with the gentle gesture of "a dragonfly touching the water".

;

;On October 20, 2020, the "Pluto" probe landed in the "Nightingale" sampling area. The sampling head with a diameter of 0.3 meters was in contact with the surface of the star for about 6 seconds, collecting the gravel and dust particles on the surface of the asteroid, and then ignited and left. The revised contingency plan was unusually successful: the detector collected about 250 grams of samples, far exceeding the originally planned 60-gram sample mission requirement.

;

;On October 28, 2020, the "Pluto" packaged the collected samples into the return capsule. On May 10, 2021, the probe set off to return to Earth orbit with precious asteroid samples, and on September 24, 2023, it accurately and successfully landed the return capsule at the Utah Desert Experiment Base.

;

;The plan announced by NASA: In the next two years, 25% of the samples will be sent to about 200 scientists from many countries for research. The remaining 75% of the samples will be sealed for decades, waiting for future scientific and technological progress and the emergence of more advanced new technologies and equipment, before the samples can be taken out in batches for research.

;

;The wonderful thing is that the "Pluto" detection mission is not over. After ejecting the sample return capsule back to the earth, it will use the earth's "gravitational slingshot effect" to fly to another asteroid Apophis ( Apophis, the Egyptian god of destruction and chaos). Thereafter, the mission code name of "Pluto" will be changed to "Apophis Explorer".

;

;"Apophis" is a smaller but more dangerous asteroid than "Bennu", with a diameter of about 370 meters. In 2029, it will pass by the earth at a high speed about 32,000 kilometers away, which is closer than the geostationary satellite at a distance of 36,000 kilometers from the ground. There is a 2.7% probability of hitting the earth.

;

;Asteroids with a diameter greater than 140 meters are called "nation destroyers". If they hit a medium-sized country, they will be directly destroyed; even the largest countries in terms of territory will be destroyed if they are hit. Thus it declined. Asteroids with a diameter of more than 10 kilometers are "planet destroyers" and can smash the earth into pieces.

;

;Scientists from the "Pluto/Apophis Explorer" mission team will control the probe into its orbit when the asteroid passes by the Earth on April 13, 2029, for a period of 18 months. The moon's "Apophis" close-up exploration will conduct a comprehensive survey in order to study the motion characteristics of near-Earth asteroids. Finally, the probe will turn on its propulsion system and stir up the asteroid's surface to study the materials and structures beneath its surface.

;

;Obviously, the scientist team of the "OSIRIS-Rex" project does not care much about the 2.7% asteroid impact rate, and planetary defense is not a research task within its project. The next step depends on whether NASA will take advantage of the opportunity of "Apophis" being delivered to our doorstep in 2029 to try the "planetary defense" project experiment again, using rocket thrust to change the orbit of the asteroid and push it farther away from the earth.

;

;The complexity and fantasy of the "Pluto/Apophis Explorer" mission are somewhat similar to a "Star Trek"-like journey of exploration: a vision of the future, curiosity about unknown areas, and a desire for science. Perseverance in exploration, persistence in dreams, unbridled imagination, and technical excellence...are all intertwined into a legend that is far from over.
